altTitles.ja: 不滅のあなたへ

altTitles.th: แด่เธอผู้เป็นนิรันดร์

description.en:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

**Links:**  
**Officially Translated:**   
- Alternative English version by [K MANGA](<https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10076/episode/319887>)

description.fr:
"C'est à l'épreuve de la réalité que je saurai ce que je suis... Voilà pourquoi mon voyage commence."

Un être sous forme d'une petite sphère est envoyé sur terre, celle-ci change d'apparence en fonction de ce qu'elle rencontre.
Elle rencontre d'abord un loup puis un jeune garçon vivant seul au milieu d'un paysage enneigé. Chaque nouvelle rencontre est une occasion de vivre de nouvelles expérience pour cet être. Ainsi commence le voyage de l'Immortel, un voyage fait d'expériences et de rencontres dans un monde implacable...
description.ja: 『聲の形』の大今良時が贈る、永遠の旅。真っ白な魂で世界に降り立つ！──現実だけが自分が誰なのかを教えてくれる。だから僕は、旅に出る。
description.ru: Отправленное на землю бессмертное существо знакомится с мальчиком, одиноко живущим в Тундре. Существо может принимать форму умерших, но только если «импульс» сильнее предыдущего. С какими впечатлениями и встречами столкнётся существо, живущее вечно?
description.pt-br:
Um ser imortal foi enviado à superfície da terra e encontrou um menino que vivia sozinho no meio da tundra.
O ser pode assumir a forma de coisas moribundas, mas somente se o "ímpeto" for mais forte que o anterior. Que tipo de experiências e encontros o ser encontrará enquanto viver para sempre?

---
- **Ganhou o 43º Prêmio Kodansha Manga na categoria shounen em 2019**

description.en: ‘Meok Gwi-Sa’ is a Monster Hunter who eats monsters to protect the human world. After the release of the Hell demon, he lost his power. He managed to survive and met Goyoung. Goyoung, is a young individual with a petite build, who has endured a lifetime of torment due to his physical stature. His childhood friend, Kang Jong-bo, suddenly transforms into a bully during high school. However, their lives take an unexpected turn when Goyoung acquired a mysterious power which is the ability to devour monsters. Goyoung embarks on a perilous journey to protect humanity from the impending threat of the Gate to Hell. Will he be able to control his new powers and save the world from its impending doom?

altTitles.ja: ルリドラゴン

description.en:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!
description.tr: Tembellik ve çalışkanlık arasında git gel yaşayan ejder kızın gündelik maceraları.
description.pt-br: Ruri Aoki é uma garota normal que um dia acorda com um par de chifres em sua cabeça. De acordo com sua mãe, o pai de Ruri, que ela nunca conheceu antes, é um dragão e Ruri só é metade humana. Esta é a história da jornada de autodescobrimento e aceitação de uma garota metade humana, metade dragão.

title.en: Miss Wolf and Her Fox Sister

altTitles.zh: 狼小姐和她的狐狸妹妹

description.en: [Savage Wolf X Cunning Fox] In the modern therianthrope world, everyone respects the law of the jungle where the strong prey on the weak. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi, as a gray wolf therianthrope, stands at the top of the food chain. She has made a name for herself with her fists. She is violent and volatile, always looking down on the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister left a fox cub with her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a good big dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub, train it into a model student, and give it the best that life has to offer. However, the little fox is hiding a wicked heart under the guise of a good girl...

title.en: I Became a Childhood Friend of a Mid-Level Boss

altTitles.en: I Became the Childhood Friend of the Middle Boss

description.en:
Do Kyunwoo is the black sheep of his renowned swordsman family. He cannot even catch a rabbit on his own. On his first day of fifth grade, he meets a tranfer student and recalls his past life.

He had reincarnated into the world of a game he used to play called [Brave Hearts]. He was already frustrated that he had reincarnated as a loser, but on top of that, the transfer student is an intermediate/mid-tier boss who will destroy the world!

“Why are you being so nice to me?”

“Because I want to be friends with you.”

Do Kyunwoo’s plan is to become friends with the transfer student in order to prevent the end of the world!

In order to survive in this new world and to reach an ending he desires. He becomes best friends with the mid level boss.

altTitles.ja: 異世界サムライ

description.en:
The strongest swordsman of the Warring States period, transferred to another world.

At the end of the Warring States Period, Ginko, the greatest swordsman of the time, was always hungry for a fight to the death with someone stronger than herself. After cutting and cutting and cutting, she finally despairs that there is no one stronger than her in this world, and then she is transferred to another world! Before her eyes - a dragon!
description.ja:
戦国時代最強の剣豪、異世界転移。

戦国時代末期、最強の剣豪・ギンコは常に、自分より強いものとの死闘に飢えていた。切って切って切りまくり、ついにこの世に自分以上の強者がいないと絶望した矢先、異世界へ転移！　目の前には――ドラゴン！？
description.pt-br:
A espadachim mais forte do período dos Reinos Combatentes, transferida para outro mundo.

No final do Período dos Reinos Combatentes, Ginko, a maior espadachim da época, estava sempre ansiosa por lutar até a morte com alguém mais forte que ela. Depois de cortar e cortar e cortar, ela finalmente se desespera porque não há ninguém mais forte do que ela neste mundo, e então ela é transferida para outro mundo! Diante de seus olhos está um dragão!

altTitles.zh-ro: Sanguozhi Qunxiongzhuan: Huo Feng Liao Yuan

altTitles.zh-hk: 三国志群雄伝火鳳燎原

altTitles.ja: 火鳳燎原

altTitles.de: The Ravages of Time: Die Geschichte der Drei Reiche

description.en:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!

altTitles.ja: 8月31日のロングサマー

description.en:
Suzuki-kun and Takagi-san — two high-schoolers who found each other in a time loop on August 31. The two are the only ones who keep their memories when it loops. As for the cause of the time loop, one thing comes to mind — Suzuki-kun's lingering regrets for the summer, a guy's greatest ambition....

It's a time loop comedy of youth, romance, and facing love head-on!
description.ja:
何度も繰り返す8月31日の中で出会った高校生の二人・鈴木くんと高木さん。

記憶を繰り越せるのは二人だけ。

タイムループの原因として考えられるのは、鈴木くんが夏休みにやり残した、男子最大の目標…。

恋と真っ向から対峙する、青春タイムループコメディ！
description.ru:
31 августа повторяется снова и снова. Сохранить об этом воспоминания могут только два школьника – Сузуки-кун и Такаги-сан. Задумавшись о причине возникновения такой временной петли, Сузуки-кун пришёл к выводу, что всё дело в нём: его незавершённых делах летом и большом сожалении на этот счёт. Чтобы выбраться из временной тюрьмы подросток решает действовать…
Вас ждёт любовная комедия противостояния любви и временной петли!
description.vi: Thế giới bị rơi vào 1 vòng lặp thời gian, chỉ có 2 người giữ lại được ký ức là Suzuki và Takagi. Nếu muốn thoát khỏi vòng lặp thì Suzuki phải hoàn thành ước nguyện còn dang dở của cậu: kiếm được bạn gái và thoát kiếp trai tân.

altTitles.ja: ジャイアントお嬢様

description.en:
I can't believe my ojou-sama is so huge!  
  
Fujido Oriko is the buxom young head of the Fujido Zaibatsu, a group that has a monopoly on Japan's vending machine industry. And serving at her side is her personal butler, the eccentric Dr. Sebastion.  
  
When a monster suddenly attacks the city, Dr. Sebastion slips his ojou-sama an experimental energy drink his team in R&D has been developing. As a result, she quickly finds herself growing into a giantess, matching the attacking kaiju in size! Will she be able to stop his rampage, or at the very least, keep her dignity intact?  
  
*[The pre-serialization version was the winner of Shounen Jump's Dec 2020 Bronze Rookie Award. The current serialization is on Sunday Web Every.]*
description.es-la: No me puedo creer que mi Ojou-sama sea tan grande! Fujido Oriko es la exuberante hija del Conglomerado Fujido, un grupo que tiene un monopolio de la industria de máquinas expendedoras en Japón. Y a su lado está su mayordomo personal, el excéntrico Dr. Sebastian. Cuando un monstruo ataca de repente la ciudad, el Dr. Sebastian le da a su ojou-sama una bebida experimental que su equipo de I+D había estado desarrollando. Como resultado, ella crece hasta convertirse en una giganta! Será capaz de aplacar la ira de los invasores o, al menos, mantener intacta su dignidad?

title.en: I Became the Young Villain's Sister-in-Law

altTitles.en: Became the Sister-in-Law of a Young Yandere

description.en:
After being reincarnated as an extra with amnesia, I saved a child by chance, but he was the villain… What? 

The villain had a brother who died because of a fairy's curse. He was the reason for the villain's corruption. How cruel, if I met that fairy, I would have killed her, but unfortunately I'm an extra... 

“Elia?” 

Wait… Am *I* that fairy?
description.fr:
Après avoir possédé une figurante amnésique, j’ai involontairement sauvé un enfant. Mais il s’est révélé qu’il était un méchant.

…Hein ? Le méchant avait un frère aîné décédé à cause de la malédiction d’une fée. Sa mort est ce qui transforme son cadet en méchant. Pauvres frères. Si je rencontrais la fée, je lui mettrais une bonne raclée. Malheureusement, je ne suis qu’une figurante…

«Ellia?»

Attendez… Cette fée, c’est *moi*?

*** Pour pouvoir aller à l’endroit où se trouve la clé pouvant lever la malédiction, je dois me marier. J’ai donc été contrainte à épouser le frère aîné. Je ne sais pas comment lever sa malédiction à cause de l’amnésie. C’est pourquoi j’allais aider à briser ce mauvais sort et demander de l’aide, mais…

«Tu me fais vivre. Quand je te touche, tous les symptômes dus à la malédiction disparaissent.»

Est-ce que l’homme sans émotions qui ne se préoccupait que de son petit frère me sourit-il vraiment affectueusement?

«Grand frère est bête! Comment peux-tu laisser Ellia partir? Je te déteste, grand frère!»

Qui aurait deviné que la relation entre les meilleurs frères au monde se dégraderait ainsi?!

«Le château du grand duc sans Ellia est si effrayant… S’il te plaît, ne divorce pas avec grand frère.»

«Ne peux-tu pas… rester ma femme?»

J’ai été poliment été mise au pied du mur. Mon dieu, que devrais-je faire avec ces deux-là?
description.id: Setelah mengalami amnesia tambahan, saya secara tidak sengaja menyelamatkan seorang anak, tetapi dia adalah seorang penjahat. …Hah? Penjahat itu punya kakak laki-laki yang meninggal karena kutukan peri. Dialah alasan kegelapan penjahat itu. Saudara-saudara yang malang. Jika aku bertemu peri itu, aku akan menghajarnya, sayangnya, aku hanya ekstra… “Ellia?” Tunggu… Jadi peri itu adalah aku?

title.en: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi

altTitles.ja: これからだんだん幸せになっていく怖い 女上司

altTitles.ar: رئيسة مرعبة تزداد سعادة وسعادة من الآن فصاعدًا

altTitles.ja-ro: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi
Korekara Dondon Shiawase ni Natte iku Kowai Jōshi

altTitles.en: A Scary Boss, But From Now on She's Going to Be Happier and Happier

altTitles.es-la: Una jefa que da miedo, pero a partir de ahora va a ser cada vez más feliz.

description.ar: مديرتي مخيفة للغايه، لكن من الأن وصاعدًا سأبذل قصارى جهدي لجعلها الأسعد.
description.en:
This is a heart-pounding love comedy between "Manager Tsuruse'', a female boss who is scary at work but whose hobbies are cute clothes(?!), and "Tsukinawa-kun'', a new male employee who joins the company mid-career!

There is also a FANBOX version, a collection of 0.5 "Naughty" stories: 
[Kowai Onna Joushi ga Nuidara H de Kawaikatta Hanashi - FANBOX 0.5 Matome【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/ef970af6-8357-43bb-9bd1-fe09dba78624/kowai-onna-joushi-ga-nuidara-h-de-kawaikatta-hanashi-fanbox-0-5-matome)
description.es-la: Mi jefa da mucho miedo, pero mientras más hablo con ella deja de hacerlo.

title.en: Hazure Skill “Gacha” de Tsuihou Sareta Ore wa, Wagamama Osananajimi wo Zetsuen Shi Kakusei Suru

altTitles.ja-ro: Hazure Skill “Gacha” de Tsuihou Sareta Ore wa, Wagamama Osananajimi wo Zetsuen Shi Kakusei Suru ~ Bannou Cheat Skill wo Getto Shite, Mezase Rakuraku Saikyou Slow Life!~

altTitles.ja: ハズレスキル『ガチャ』で追放された俺は、わがまま幼馴染を絶縁し覚醒する ～万能チートスキルをゲットして、目指せ楽々最強スローライフ！～

altTitles.en: After Being Banished For Having The Trash Skill "Gacha", I Came To My Senses And Broke Off Relations With My Selfish Childhood Friend

description.en: Crest was born as the fifth son of a duke. However, as the fifth son, he was in no position to talk. His childhood friend and also his fiancée, Ellis, treated him just like a slave. And on Crest's coming-of-age ceremony, he received a skill called "Gacha." Yet, he wasn't able to learn how to use it and was banished away from his home. Banished into the forest full of monsters, Crest began to understand the power "Gacha." And then, Crest made up his mind. He will definitely survive and get back on his feet.

altTitles.ja: シバタリアン

description.en: In the spring of my third year of middle school, I found Shibata buried beneath a sakura tree. We watched movies and became fast friends, even planned to make a movie together for the school festival...but no one at school seemed to know him. I will discover Shibata and the whole world will turn into Shibata. This is a story of, by, and for Shibata. Now showing in a theater near you.

Kim Cheong-ha, a legendary swordswoman and the Queen of Joseon, meets a tragic end in a palace conspiracy. Reborn as Park Da-jin, a high school student tormented by bullies, she channels her royal spirit into a fierce counterattack. With centuries of wisdom and unmatched skill, she’s ready to deliver justice.

altTitles.ja: 家がない！

description.en:
Haejoon Goh, who ran from home, and Eunyung Baek, the problem child who lives in a tent.   
These two, who met under terrible circumstances, are forced to live together in an abandoned dormitory.   
This is a story of difficult growth between two people who hate both the dorm and each other.

title.ja: Clevatess - Majuu no Ou to Akago to Shikabane no Yuusha

altTitles.en: Clevatess - The King of Devil Beasts, the Baby, and the Brave of the Undead

altTitles.ja: Clevatess
クレバテス−魔獣の王と赤子と屍の勇者−

altTitles.pt-br: Clevatess - O Rei das Feras Diabólicas, O bebê e a Valente Heróina Morta-Viva

description.en:
It killed the heroes, killed the king, the devil beast then found the “baby of fate”…
Having both superior intellect and destructive power, such is Clevatess, the king of the devil beasts.
Angered by the 13 heroes tasked to take his life, he decided to bring ruin on mankind but get entrusted with an unexpected nuisance: a newborn human baby.
Is it the tale of a near-ending world close to the apocalypse or the diary of new era childcare?
description.pt-br: Ele matou os heróis, matou o rei, a fera demoníaca então encontrou o “bebê do destino”… Tendo intelecto superior e poder destrutivo, tal é Clevatess, o rei das feras demoníacas. Irritado com os 13 heróis encarregados de tirar sua vida, ele decidiu arruinar a humanidade, mas foi encarregado de um incômodo inesperado: um bebê humano recém-nascido. É a história de um mundo próximo do fim, perto do apocalipse, ou o diário dos cuidados infantis da nova era?

description.en:
Kang Sihwa was everyone's sun, always in the spotlight, and the people around Lee Eunseo were always jealous of her because of her special childhood friend Sihwa. One day, Sihwa, who had suddenly disappeared, returned a few years later. With the swaying of Eunseo’s heart and Sihwa’s unpredictable behavior. We have a special relationship, right? Don't you think so? But… I still want to ask. What are we both doing?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=10965984)
description.ko: 모두의 태양이자 주목받는 존재인 강시화, 그런 시화와 특별한 소꿉 친구 사이로 주변의 질투를 받던 이은서. 어느 날 홀연히 사라졌던 시화가 몇 년이 흘러 돌아왔다. 자꾸 흔들리는 은서의 마음과 도저히 짐작할 수 없는 시화의 행동. 우리는 특별한 사이잖아? 너도 그렇게 생각하지? 하지만… 묻고 싶어. 너랑 난 뭐하는 사이야?
description.tr: Kang Sihwa, doğal bir dışadönük olarak her zaman ilgi odağıydı ve Lee Eunseo, Sihwa onun özel çocukluk arkadaşı olduğu için çevresindekilere kıskançlıkla bakıyordu. Bir gün aniden ortadan kaybolan Sihwa, birkaç yıl sonra geri döndü. Eunseo’nun kalbi sürekli çırpınırken Si-hwa’nın davranışları tahmin edilemezdi. Bizim özel bir ilişkimiz var, değil mi? Sen de öyle düşünüyorsun, değil mi? Ama… Sormak istiyorum. Bizim ilişkimiz tam olarak nedir?

description.en:
Decommisioned police officer Zhounan, is perplexed by a peculiar psychological experience. Upon contact with any object, he is able to perceive an individual's thoughts and envision what they experienced. Evidently he finds himself entangled within the city he is in - the numerous legends within the Lost City cities. And those seemingly absurd legends hide surprising secrets. A weird world slowly opens its doors to us…

---
**Notes:**
- This is not long strip.

title.en: Summoned by Being Involved?! And I Was "God"??

altTitles.ja-ro: Makikomare Shoukan?! Soshite Watashi wa "Kami" deshita??

altTitles.ja: 巻き込まれ召喚!? そして私は『神』でした??

description.en:
I was summoned to an unknown world to defeat the Demon King, but my level seems to be very low when compared to the others that were summoned with me…  
  
Wait a minute, my occupation is "God?"

title.en: A Returner's Magic Should Be Special

altTitles.ja: 帰還者の魔法は特別です

altTitles.zh-hk: 重生者的魔法一定要特別

altTitles.th: พลังขั้นเทพของจอมเวทจุติใหม่

altTitles.es: La magia de un retornado debe ser especial

altTitles.vi: Ma thuật đặc biệt của phù thủy quay ngược thời gian

altTitles.pt-br: A Magia de um Retornado Tem de Ser Especial

description.de:
"Jetzt, wo ich zurückgekehrt bin, werde ich keinen meiner Liebsten wieder sterben lassen!" Das Labyrinth der Schatten - die tödlichste Katastrophe, der die Menschheit jemals gegenüberstand. Desir Arman, einer der sechs Überlebenden der Menschheit, befindet sich im Labyrinth. Die sechs versuchen gemeinsam, die letzte Prüfung des Labyrinths zu meistern, scheitern aber, woraufhin die Welt untergeht. Aber als sich Desir gerade auf sein Ende vorbereitet, erscheint plötzlich vor ihm die Welt … von vor 13 Jahren?! Desir ist in die Vergangenheit zurückgekehrt, in eine Zeit, als er Schüler an der besten Magierschule seines war. Er und seine Liebsten wurden wieder vereint, und er ist entschlossen, dieses Mal sie und die Welt zu retten! Es bleiben noch drei Jahre bevor die Schattenwelt erscheint! Ändere die Vergangenheit und versammle mächtige Kameraden um dich, um die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en:
"Now that I'm back, I won't allow my loved ones to die again!"  
  
The Shadow Labyrinth - the deadliest catastrophe humanity has ever known.  
Desir Arman, one of the six remaining survivors of mankind, is inside the Labyrinth. The six of them attempt to clear the final level of the Labyrinth but ultimately fail, and the world comes to an end.  
However, when Desir thought he would meet his demise, what appears before him is the world… thirteen years ago?!  
  
Desir is returned to the past, back to the time when he enrolled at the nation's finest magic academy, Havrion. He is reunited with his precious friends, and he is determined to change the past to save the world and his loved ones…!  
  
Three years remain before the emergence of the Shadow World!  
Change the past and gather powerful comrades to save mankind!

description.fr:
Le monde est au bord de la destruction après une guerre dévastatrice de dix ans dans le « Labyrinthe des ombres ». Desir Herrman est l'un des derniers magiciens restants, mais il n'est pas assez puissant pour combattre l'ennemi fatal qui menace l'Humanité. Alors qu'il est certain que la fin est proche, il est renvoyé dans le temps, à l'époque où il étudiait la magie à la prestigieuse Académie Hebrion ! Grâce à cette seconde chance, Desir est bien décidé à sauver non seulement sa peau, mais également celle de ses amis et camarades perdus. Sachant déjà ce que le futur leur réserve, ses efforts pourront-ils faire la différence, ou bien seront-ils tous condamnés à revivre le même destin tragique ? Adapté du roman phare.

description.id:
"Agak disesalkan, tapi sebaiknya kita bersia-siap untuk mati!"
"Apa dunia akan benar-benar berakhir di sini?!"

Desir mengira semua sudah berakhir. Namun, ternyata dia kembali ke ujian masuk akademi hevrion 13 tahun yang lalu! Ia kembali berkumpul dengan orang-orang tercinta yang mati dalam dunia bayangan. Tiga tahun tersisa sebelum dunia bayangan muncul! 

"Kesempatan datang lagi, aku tidak akan kehilangan orang-orang yang kucintai untuk kedua kalinya!"

description.ja:
人類が迎えた最悪の災害、影の迷宮。 「デジール・アルマン」は影の迷宮の中で最後まで生き残った生存者6人のうちの1人である。 彼らは影の迷宮の最後のボスに挑戦したが、失敗し、世界は滅亡を迎えてしまった。 全てが終わったと思った瞬間、「デジール」の目の前に見える光景は…13年前の世界！？ 帝国最高の魔法学院、へブリオン学園の入学式に戻ってきた「デジール」 最悪の災害「影の世界」発生までの残りの時間は3年！ 過去を変え、強い仲間を集めて、世界を救えることはできるだろうか！

description.ko:
"다시 돌아온 이상, 사랑하는 사람들을 두 번 잃을 순 없어!"

인류가 맞이한 최악의 재앙, 그림자 미궁.
데지르 아르망은 미궁 속에서 
마지막까지 살아남은 최후의 생존자 6명 중 한 명이다.
그들은 그림자 미궁의 마지막 단계에 도전하지만 결국 실패하고
세계는 멸망을 맞이하고 만다.

모든 게 끝이라 생각했던 순간,
데지르의 눈앞에 펼쳐진 것은 다름 아닌 13년 전의 세상?!

제국 최고의 마법 학원, 헤브리온에 입학했던 순간으로 돌아온 데지르.
그림자 미궁에서 잃었던 소중한 사람들과 재회하게 되고,
사랑하는 사람들과 세상을 구하기 위해 과거를 바꾸고자 하는데…!

그림자 세계 발생까지 남은 시간은 3년!
과거를 바꾸고, 강한 동료를 모아 세상을 구원하라!

description.ru:
"Теперь, когда я вернулся, я не позволю дорогим для меня людям снова умереть".
Лабиринт Теней – главная катастрофа для человечества за всю историю его существования.
Дезир Арман – один из шести выживших людей.

Шесть попыток зачистить последний уровень лабиринта потерпели полную неудачу, и теперь мир близится к концу.
Однако, когда Дезир готовится встретить свою кончину, то, что открывается перед ним – это мир... 13 лет назад?!

Дезир возвращается в прошлое, когда он только поступил в самую престижную магическую академию магии в стране – Хаврион. Он вновь воссоединился со своими дорогими друзьями и готов изменить прошлое, чтобы спасти этот мир и тех, кто ему дорог.

Остались три года до появления Теневого Мира! Измените прошлое и соберите могущественных товарищей, чтобы спасти человечество!

description.vi:
Desir vật lộn trong Mê cung bóng tối suốt 10 năm dài đằng đẵng, chứng kiến đồng đội và bạn bè lần lượt ngã xuống, mãi đến khi toàn đội cả trăm người chỉ còn vỏn vẹn 6 người thì mới đánh bại được kẻ thù chung. Những tưởng đã cứu được thế giới khỏi nguy cơ diệt vong, nào ngờ tai họa bất ngờ ập đến cuốn trôi tất cả mọi thứ. Lần nữa tỉnh lại, Desir phát hiện mình đã quay ngược thời gian trở về ngày đầu nhập học ở Học viện Hebrion. Liệu lần này anh có thể bảo vệ những người mình thương yêu và cứu vớt thế giới không?

不知何时，世界上出现了能蚕食现世的并行世界——“影世界”。只有战胜影迷宫，人类才能获得宁静，然而最终一切付之一炬，战斗失败，地球灭亡。但这并非结局，而是另一个开始……

description.zh-hk:
「既然已經回來了，
就不能再次失去心愛的人們!」

人類正面臨最可怕的災難——影之迷宮。
戴基爾．阿曼德是迷宮裡最後的6名倖存者之一。
他們試圖挑戰迷宮的最後關卡，
然而卻以失敗告終，
世界最終走向滅亡。

當以為一切已經結束的那刻，
戴基爾卻回到了13年前的過去?!

當時的戴基爾正要進入帝國最強的魔法學院——
赫布里溫學院就讀，
並且與在迷宮中逝去的珍貴夥伴們重逢。
為了拯救他心愛的人們與這個世界，
他決心要改變過去...!

距離影之世界出現的時間只剩3年了!
快召集強悍的同伴一同拯救世界吧!

description.en: In ancient times, a vile dragon summoned a flood that drowned the village. Since then, every year, the villagers would sacrifice a bride to the dragon for it to eat, doing so ensured the safety and peace of the village. This year, it is the Black Dragon YanMing’s turn to take the sacrificed bride, however he takes no interest in humans and would rather live on a diet of fruits. But, due to the constant nagging of the housekeeper, magpie XiQue, he had no choice but to go to the village and receive the bride offered by the village. YanMing, who was originally against the idea of going, couldn’t help but notice that the “mute” bride was so strange! She wasn’t afraid of him, but instead, very excited?! Whatever…let's capture her first!

altTitles.ja: 寄宿学校のジュリエット

description.en: Juliet Persia and Inuzuka Romio are archenemies. They lead two high school dormitories from two rivaling countries. Both factions are dead set on defeating the other to gain control over the island they have to share. Beneath the feuding exterior, however, Persia and Inuzuka long for love and peace for their budding relationship…
description.it:
Juliet Persia e Romio Inuzuka sono a capo di due dormitori rivali presso l'accademia privata Dahlia, in cui risiedono gli studenti appartenenti a due paesi differenti, i "Black Doggy" e i "White Cat". Le due fazioni sono in guerra tra loro per contendersi il controllo dell'isola in cui vivono. Juliet e Romio si dimostrano agli occhi dei loro compagni di dormitorio come acerrimi nemici, ma in realtà sono segretamente innamorati l'uno dell'altra e costretti a mantenere nascosta la loro relazione per non subire ripercussioni.  
  
  
 **Links:**   
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/3628803)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/yousukekaneda)
description.ru:
История проходит в школе-интернате Далия, престижной школе на изолированном острове, где учатся студенты из Восточной страны и Западного княжества. Враждебные отношения соседних стран не меняются и внутри школы — день изо дня между учениками происходят стычки из-за взаимной неприязни. К этой и без того напряжённой ситуации добавляется то, что Ромио Инудзука, лидер первокурсников из общежития Восточной страны, известного как «Чёрные собаки», и Джульетта Персия, лидер первокурсников из общежития Западного княжества, известного как «Белые кошки», тайно влюблены друг в друга!
Об этих отношениях, невзирая ни на какие обстоятельства, абсолютно никто не должен узнать!

title.ja: Silent Witch Chinmoku no Majo no Kakushigoto

altTitles.ja: サイレント・ウィッチ 沈黙の魔女の隠しごと

description.en:
Monica Everett is revered as “The Silent Witch.” She’s the only magician in the world who can use magic without an incantation... In reality though, she’s just shy— the only reason she practiced chantless magic was so that she wouldn't have to speak in public! Before even realizing her own talent, Monica is chosen as one of the “Seven Sages,” and is assigned the secret mission of protecting the kingdom’s second prince...?

The antisocial young prodigy will have to hide her true nature while secretly rescuing the prince from encroaching danger in this thrilling fantasy story!
description.es:
Monica Everett es venerada como «La Bruja Silenciosa». Es la única maga del mundo que puede usar la magia sin conjuros... En realidad, es tímida: ¡la única razón por la que practicaba magia sin encantamientos era para no tener que hablar en público! Antes incluso de darse cuenta de su propio talento, Mónica es elegida como uno de los «Siete Sabios», ¿y se le asigna la misión secreta de proteger al segundo príncipe del reino...?

La antisocial joven prodigio tendrá que ocultar su verdadera naturaleza mientras rescata en secreto al príncipe del peligro que la acecha en esta emocionante historia de fantasía.
description.id: Keajaiban tidak membutuhkan nyanyian. Ini adalah kisah tentang penyihir terlemah, paling pemalu, namun terkuat, dan bagaimana dia dilahirkan kembali, semuanya menjadi sebuah buku. (Penyihir Keheningan) Monica Everett. Satu-satunya penyihir di dunia yang bisa menggunakan sihir diam (tanpa nyanyian), dan seorang pahlawan muda yang membunuh sendiri naga hitam legendaris itu. Tapi apa sifat aslinya?? Alasan sebenarnya saya berlatih sihir diam adalah agar saya tidak perlu berbicara di depan umum. Ketika Monica terpilih sebagai salah satu dari 7 Watchers, tanpa disadari, dia terpaksa mengambil misi rahasia untuk melindungi pangeran kedua…? Lemah dan pemalu, namun yang terkuat. Penyihir surgawi yang antisosial menyembunyikan identitas aslinya dan diam-diam membawa kejahatan ke pengadilan melawan pangeran dalam fantasi yang menyakitkan! Fantasi penyihir web, terlahir kembali menjadi sebuah buku, dengan tambahan! Apa yang akan menjadi misteri baru yang berdiri di depan Monica Everett…?

title.en: Dorei kara no Kitai to Hyouka no sei de Sakushu dekinai no daga

altTitles.ja: 奴隷からの期待と評価のせいで搾取できないのだが

altTitles.en: Due to Their Appreciation and Expectations, I Can't Exploit My Slaves

altTitles.es-la: No puedo aprovecharme de mis esclavas por la talentosas que son

description.en:
A reincarnated boy, Allen, gets granted by a goddess the cheat skill, [Restoration]. Even though he can heal all and any injuries and illnesses, there aren't a lot of places where he can use that skill to the fullest, so he planned to "regenerate" the slaves he bought and lead a slow-paced life. But the healed slaves' cheats turned out so out of the ordinary that the crops they tend to and their living conditions turned for the better in a blink of an eye.

The protagonist, Allen, who slowly but surely is robbed of opportunities to shine, tried to counter that with his modern knowledge, and yet, those talented slaves absorbed it all and brought success to any and all businesses. 

The protagonist is becoming irrelevant with each passing day?!
description.ja:
どんな理想も全て実現。…そう、有能な部下たちがね。

不慮の事故で転生した少年・アレンはチート能力【再生】を授かる。怪我を負った奴隷の美少女たちを【再生】し、ハーレムスローライフを送ろうと画策するも、完治した奴隷たちのチートがヤバすぎて、主人公の出る幕ナシ…！？
description.es-la:
El chico reencarnado, Allen, recibe del dios un poder trampa llamado "Regeneración". Aunque puede curar cualquier herida o enfermedad, su oportunidad de brillar es limitada. Por eso, planea regenerar a las chicas esclavas y llevar una vida tranquila con su harén. 

Sin embargo, las chicas esclavas completamente curadas son demasiado fuertes, lo que lleva a un rápido crecimiento en la producción de alimentos y las condiciones de vida. Allen intenta competir con su conocimiento moderno, pero sus talentosas esclavas lo superan y tienen un gran éxito en los negocios. 
La sombra del protagonista se va desvaneciendo cada vez más... 
¿Podrá recuperar su lugar en la historia?

description.en: After—something—changed his life four years ago, Sunny has not left his house once, living in his own reclusive bubble. Hoping for a fresh start for her son, his mother decides to move their family out of town. However, when his childhood friend Kel re-enters his life, Sunny finds himself thrust back into a world he once knew. With only three days before the move, the duo come across familiar faces as they go through town—reawakening a dark past that Sunny has tried so hard to forget.

altTitles.en: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

altTitles.ja: トニカクカワイイ

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

altTitles.ja: 艶漢

description.en: Laid-back and somewhat absent-mindedly seductive umbrella craftsman Shiro, and hot-blooded officer Kojiro, who stands against all things undisciplined, become involved in a bloody and erotic thrill-ride in an off-kilter town. This action-packed jack-of-all-trades manga will have you swooning at its sexiness and leave you more addicted than opium!
description.ja: ユルい着流しにノーフン（フンドシしてないってことダ）がちな妖艶系ぼんやり傘職人・詩郎と、だらしない人がぜんぜんゆるせない熱血正義漢（妹萌え）な巡査殿・光路郎が、世界の果てのまぼろしみたいな裏町でエログロ猟奇な事件に巻き込まれる！眉目秀麗悶絶お色気アクション・パノラマ百貨店、この阿片的中毒性！

title.en: The Villainess Wants to Turn Over a New Leaf

altTitles.en: Max-Level Green Tea Transmigrates Into Little Pitiful One

altTitles.zh-ro: Man Ji Lvcha Chuan Cheng Xiao Kelian
Mǎn Jí Lǜchá Chuān Chéng Xiǎo Kělián

altTitles.en: Villainess Wants to Turn Over a New Leaf

description.en:
Lin Feilu is an oscar-winning actress. Acting cute, slandering, feigning innocence, or playing the white lotus. Regardless, she wasn't a good person. She then died on her 27th birthday. She vowed, if there was a next life, she would be a good person. In the end, she transmigrated into a five-year-old princess of the great Lin Dynasty. Her imperial mother was not favored, her older brother was mentally challenged, and her life was constantly in danger, with having little to eat and trying to stay warm.

Lin Feilu: …You all forced me!
description.fr:
Lin Feilu est une actrice oscarisée. Faire la mignonne, médire, feindre l'innocence ou jouer les innocentes. Peu importe, elle n’est pas quelqu'un de bien. Elle meurt le jour de son 27e anniversaire en se jurant que si elle a une prochaine vie, elle serait une bonne personne. Elle se réincarne en une princesse de cinq ans de la grande dynastie Dalin. Sa mère, concubine impériale n'était pas favorisée parce son frère aîné souffrait d'une déficience mentale.
Lin Feilu, bien que déterminée à rester une bonne personne, va utiliser ses talents de manipulatrice pour retourner la situation de sa famille.

altTitles.zh-ro: Hu Ru Yi Ye Bing Jiao

description.en: Yu Xiang unfortunately transmigrates into a merchant's daughter, who was mistakenly taken to the marquis manor at birth. She is immediately disabled, and carries the nickname of 'disaster star'. Helplessly, she can only cling to her older brother, the marquis, in hopes of surviving, and wait for the true master to return so she can give way. Years later, when the true master returns to the manor, Yu Xiang prepares to leave. however, she finds out her clinging technique is too good, that her marquis brother won't let her leave!
description.fr:
Yu Xiang donne, handicapée, échange son coeur avec celui de son frère. 
Après sa mort, elle se réincarne dans le corps d'une fille qui porte le même nom, est paralysée comme elle et qui est surnommée l'étoile malchanceuse. 
Yu Xiang réalise alors qu'elle est dans le roman qu'elle lisait avant de mourir. Synopsis du roman en question : Yu Xiang, fille de marchand a été échangée à la naissance avec la fille d'un Seigneur.
description.zh: 虞襄很不幸穿成了被抱到侯府的商家女，一来就双腿残废，脑袋上还顶着个‘丧门星’的称号。 无奈之下只得牢牢抱住侯爷哥哥的大腿，先把日子混下去，等正主儿回来就麻溜的让位。 几年之后正主儿回归，虞襄包袱款款准备走人，却发现抱大腿的技术太专业，侯爷哥哥不让走了！

altTitles.ja: 天才魔女の魔力枯れ

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.ja: 1mmでも図に乗った事がある元天才の君へ1万年に1人の天才魔女“ナユ”の魔力が枯れた！？天才ゆえに許されてきたあれやこれのツケが、今ブーメランのように突き刺さっていく…そんなナユが助けを求めたのは、自分のことが大好きな教え子の小麦くん。だいぶ痛いけどなんだか放って置けない奇妙な2人の共同生活が始まった！
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

altTitles.ja: 月のしっぽ

description.en:
Usagi is the granddaughter of the leader of a prestigious ninja village, but she's such a klutz that she's never made it out of the lower class. Frustrated with Usagi's lack of progress, her grandfather sends her to marry Lord Hanzo with an order to breed many ninja children. But the lord has no interest in her or her childbearing potential!

The last volume includes Promise of the Moon.

Related Series:
Ran to Aoi (Spin-Off)
Tsuki no Toiki Ai no Kizu (Prequel)

altTitles.ja: しあわせゴハン

description.en:
A man relaxing with a can of beer when a winter storm hits. A man, burdened with personal strife, finds solace in a bowl of ramen. 

A Silent Manga, each chapter is a self-contained glimpse into the life of an ordinary person, and how the meals they eat lift their spirits.

title.en: Medaka Kuroiwa is Impervious to My Charms

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai

altTitles.en: My Charms Are Wasted on Medaka Kuroiwa

altTitles.ja: 黒岩メダカに私の可愛いが通じない

altTitles.ru: Куроива Мэдака не понимает моей привлекательности

altTitles.es-la: Mis encantos no funcionan con Kuroiwa Medaka

altTitles.zh: 我的可爱对黑岩目高不管用

description.en:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) (U.S. Only)
description.fr:
Tu ne le sais pas encore, mais tu m’adores !

Mona plaît à tout le monde, c’est comme ça. Son sourire, son allure, sa personnalité… Tout chez elle attire les gens. Dans son lycée, elle fait tourner toutes les têtes. Sauf celle d’un garçon… Medaka. Fraîchement admis dans son école, celui-ci a complètement chamboulé la vie de cette fille à qui nul ni personne n’est censé résister. C’est bien simple : Medaka refuse de la regarder ou se renfrogne à la moindre de ses tentatives de rapprochement. Devant cette insulte à son charme ravageur, Mona décide de tout mettre en œuvre pour le séduire, quitte à se mettre dans des situations où elle-même ne saura plus quoi ressentir ! La tombeuse VS l’insensible : qui craquera en premier ? 

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.ja:
オチないアイツに、最強モテ女が大奮闘！「アイツのことなんて、ぜんっぜん好きじゃないないのに！！」

容姿端麗！ スタイル抜群！ 川井モナは、息をするようにモテる女!!　しかし、そんな彼女に見向きもしない転校生・黒岩メダカの登場で、モナの学校生活は一変する！　「今までずっと、チヤホヤされて生きてきたのに!!」あの手この手でメダカをオトそうと大奮闘！　時にはちょっぴりカゲキなことも!?　
モテ女子×禁欲男子のラブコメディ、大勃発――!!
description.ru: Куроива Мэдака родился в храме и в настоящее время является монахом, проходящим обучение. Из-за правил своего храма он не может общаться с девушками и более того, он даже не знает, как с ними общаться. Мона, "королева пчёл" школы, однако настойчиво пытается заставить его влюбиться в неё, но он всегда игнорирует её, чтобы сохранить правила своего храма.
description.es-la:
La mujer más popular del mundo lucha contra un tipo que no le gusta. ¡Ni siquiera me gusta en absoluto!

¡Buena apariencia! Estilo excepcional! ¡Kawai Mona es una mujer impresionante! Sin embargo, con la aparición de un estudiante transferido, Kuroiwa Medaka, que ni siquiera la mira, ¡la vida escolar de Mona cambiará por completo! "  Ella se ha pasado toda su vida siendo consentida y ha hecho todo lo posible por ganarse a Medaka que aveces pueder un poco radical.

¡La comedia romantica de una chica popular y un chico abstinente está a punto de estallar!
description.pt-br: Kuroiwa nasceu em um templo e atualmente é um monge em treinamento. Por causa das regras do seu templo, ele não pode interagir com garotas - e mais, nem mesmo sabe como fazer isso. Mona, a "abelha rainha" da escola, insistentemente tenta fazê-lo se apaixonar por ela, mas ele sempre a ignora a fim de se manter íntegro quanto as regras do seu templo.

title.en: Rikujou Jieitai Tokumu Chouhou Kikan - Beppan no Inu

altTitles.ja: 陸上自衛隊特務諜報機関 別班の犬

altTitles.en: Invisible Force: Ground Self-Defense Force Special Intelligence Agency
Ground Self-Defense Force Special Intelligence Agency - Dogs of Beppan

description.en:
The fate of the nation is in the hands of those who have abandoned both law and name… An unpredictable spy action begins! 

In the Special Operations Group, an elite unit of the Ground Self-Defense Force, there is a female member who is bored with her daily routine of training. 

One day, at the behest of her superior, she heads to a certain garrison and is recruited by a mysterious man to join a black-ops unit known as "Beppan". 

Given the name "Nana", she finds herself on the front lines of a national defense war filled with schemes and violence.

altTitles.ja: 伊月くんは正されたい

description.en:
Itsuki-kun has someone he’s interested in — a senior, Ririko-senpai, the president of the disciplinary committee! In his efforts to talk to her, he purposely messes up his uniform, but Ririko is always one step ahead—?! 

A heartwarming, dedicated youth romantic comedy begins!

“Until the day humanity falls.”

In the year 2020, Earth’s magnetic poles disappeared and humankind was nearly wiped out by cosmic radiation. Within the span of a hundred years, living creatures began to mutate and devour each other while the remaining humans, numbering in the tens of thousands, struggled bitterly in their man-made bases.

In the Abyss, home to the mutated xenogenics, there lived a sentient little mushroom. Because it had been nourished by the blood and flesh of the deceased human An Ze, not only did it take on a similar-looking human form, but a similar name as well: An Zhe.

An Zhe is determined to go to the human base to search for his spore, which had been harvested by humans. Once there, however, he faces the omnipresent risk of discovery and certain death as he tries to keep his non-human nature hidden from the Judges, whose responsibility is to inspect for and eliminate xenogenics like himself. And of all the Judges, Colonel Lu Feng is the most perceptive and merciless—as soon as he determines that someone is a xenogenic, he will execute that person on the spot.

But An Zhe’s mutation goes undetected by Lu Feng’s eyes, and so a tale of humans and xenogenics unfolds…

Silver Award winner at the 12th Chinese Nebula Awards for Chinese Science Fiction.
description.pl:
Ponury i niegościnny świat po katastrofie ekologicznej. Spustoszoną ziemię bombarduje promieniowanie kosmiczne. Niedobitki ludzkości schroniły się w dwóch ostatnich ocalałych bazach, desperacko próbując przetrwać. Każdy kontakt z obcym organizmem żywym grozi skażeniem genetycznym.

Do bazy ludzi trafia zagubiony chłopak, który w rzeczywistości nie jest nawet człowiekiem. Los styka go z bezlitosnym sędzią, wyszkolonym do tropienia i likwidowania mutantów. Niespodziewanie ich znajomość przeradza się w coś więcej…

Polskie tłumaczenie powieści dostępne tutaj: https://www.wattpad.com/story/251281478-little-mushroom

description.en: Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

altTitles.zh-ro: Si Ling Fashi! Wo Ji Shi Tianzai
Sǐ Líng Fǎshī! Wǒ Jí Shì Tiānzāi

description.en:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer!

Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges.

What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?
description.zh: 游戏降临现实，世界规则颠覆，人类进入全民转职时代。 唯有成为转职者！升级变强！方能站上世界之巅！ 转职当天，林默语成为唯一性隐藏职业，死灵法师。 从此召唤物不死绝，林默语便不会死。 “我高坐骸骨神座，行走生死之间。” “我即是天灾！”

altTitles.ja: かさねがさねの初恋ですが

description.en: Hassaku Tamao came back to his hometown to teach and fulfill a promise he made when he was younger. However, he's not the only one who remembers a promise he made...

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents to Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.es-la: El regaño que nunca quisieras recibir de tus padres
La charla que nunca quieres que te den tus padres.

title.en: My New Friend Wasn't What I Expected

altTitles.ja: 新しくできた友達が思ってたのと違った話

altTitles.ja-ro: Atarashiku Dekita Tomodachi ga Omotteta no to Chigatta Hanashi

description.en: First impressions are important, but they're not the whole story...
description.pt-br: A garota que sentada ao meu lado é muito fofa, e isso é muito bom por si só. Mas então eu a conheci fora da escola... OH, MEU!!!

altTitles.ja: 勇者くんは旅立てない

description.en: The Hero is expected by God and the People to defeat the Demon King!! And now its time to set out!! ...But before he can he is tempted by a thick sexy bunny girl! At the mercy of the Bunny girl's wiles he is unable to depart... Furthermore a Priest of the church charms him with her night skills... Will the Hero ever be able to set out on his journey?
description.ja: 勇者は神と人々から期待を受け魔王討伐のため、いざ！旅立ちの時！！…が出発前に出会った、むちむちお色気バニーガールお姉さんから数々の誘惑を受けてしまう！バニーさんの手練手管に翻弄され出発はままならず…。さらに教会より派遣された僧侶に夜のスキルで魅了され…。果たして勇者は旅立てるのかーー！

altTitles.ja: まんきつしたい常連さん

altTitles.en: Miss Regular Customer Wants to Enjoy
The Regular Enjoying Herself at the Manga Cafe

altTitles.zh-hk: 想盡情享受的常客小姐

altTitles.zh: 想尽情享受的常客小姐

description.en:
Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?

This is a slightly naughty, heartful love comedy where this gentle pair will get to "enjoy" their youth to the fullest!!
description.ja:
マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。 それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。 どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、 目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！

---

Manga kissa de hataraku daigakusei izumi ni wa ki ni natte iru jōren-san ga ita. Sore wa saikin yoku raiten suru mesukōsei no hona michan. Doko ka mubōbi de kawairashī kanojo ni wa,-me o hanasenai aru himegoto ga atte…!? Seishun o “ma n kitsu” suru yasashī futari no chottoetchina hātofururabukome!!
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!
description.pt-br:
Izumi, um estudante universitário que trabalha meio período em um café de mangá, ficou curioso sobre uma cliente regular. O nome dela é Honami, uma estudante do ensino médio que tem vindo ao café mangá recentemente. Essa garota indefesa e aparentemente fofa de quem ele não consegue tirar os olhos tem um segredo...!?

Esta é uma comédia de amor um pouco safada e sincera, onde este gentil casal poderá "aproveitar" sua juventude ao máximo!!

title.en: Maigo no Onnanoko o Ie Made Todoketara, Genkan kara Detekita no wa Gakunen Ichi no Bishoujo deshita

altTitles.ja: 迷子の女の子を家まで届けたら、玄関から出て来たのは学年一の美少女でした

altTitles.ja-ro: Maigo no Onnanoko wo Ie Made Todoketara, Genkan kara Detekita no wa Gakunen Ichi no Bishoujo deshita

altTitles.en: When I Brought a Lost Girl Home, the Most Beautiful Girl in My Grade Came Out the Front Door
She Is the Beautiful Girl in the School Year

altTitles.vi: Đưa bé gái bị lạc trở về, người mở cửa là hoa khôi của khối

description.en:
One day, Kuroda Yusei, an introverted high school student with zero dating experience, returns a lost little girl to her house... when the most beautiful girl in his grade, Shirakawa Ayano, appears! 

"As thanks for saving my sister," she begins to approach him boldly for some reason, and every day is filled with mishaps!? On top of that, a busty otaku classmate and an attention-seeking junior girl also appear, and his daily life suddenly becomes more glamorous!? 

A school romance comedy where fate changes as you suddenly become close to "the girl of your dreams"!
description.ja:
恋愛経験ゼロの陰キャ高校生・黒田雄星がある日、迷子になっていた幼女を家まで届けると… 学年一の美少女・白河綾乃が出現!!

「妹を助けてくれたお礼に」と、なぜか彼女が大胆に迫ってくるようになり、毎日がハプニング状態!?
更に巨乳オタク同級生や、かまってちゃんな後輩女子も登場し、一気に華やかな日常に――!?

“憧れのあの子”と急接近して、運命が変わる学園ラブコメ！

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

altTitles.ja: アイドル×アイドル　ストーリー！

description.en:
Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)

[Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)
description.ja: 才能がないと夢を諦めた元アイドルのミミと、ミミに憧れていた現役アイドル・イブキ。そんな2人が、ひょんな出会いから一緒にサバイバルオーディション番組への出演を目指すことに…!?　一度は諦めかけた夢、今度こそ2人でなら…！
description.ru: Мими Нагиса (22 года) — бывший айдол. После того, как она отказалась от своей мечты стать айдолом из-за отсутствия таланта, она проводит дни работая на неполный рабочий день, учась в колледже. Однако в тот момент, когда она встречает кумира Ибуки Нанакуса, к которому она недавно проявляла интерес, их жизни начинают пересекаться.

description.en:
Growing up, Eun Hae-il is unable to forget the boy he had his very first crush on.
This year, he gets accepted into his dream college after retaking the entry test 4 times.
However, one day he saves a child from drowning in the ocean but, attempting to save him, he submits to exhaustion and drowns.
Right before he stops breathing, he closes his eyes and thinks of the boy he has longed had a crush on, but when then he opens his eyes again he's no longer drowning in the ocean, but on a bus.
Hae-il, a man who has crossed between time and has survived death, now stands in front of the man he has longed loved, Yoon Pado. “Has God really given me a second chance?”
description.fr:
"Eun Hae-il", est devenu adulte sans jamais oublier le garçon dont il était secrètement amoureux. Cette année-là, après avoir passé quatre fois le concours, il a finalement été accepté dans l'école de ses rêves. Mais alors qu'il sauvait un enfant tombé à la mer, il s'est épuisé et a été emporté par les vagues, au point de se noyer lui-même.

Alors qu'il fermait les yeux en pensant au garçon qu'il aimait tant juste avant de rendre son dernier souffle, lorsqu'il les rouvrit, il se trouvait dans un bus plutôt que dans l'océan.

Ressuscité après avoir traversé la mort et le temps, Eun Hae-il se retrouve face à son amour de jeunesse, "Yoon Pado".

Est-ce que c'est vraiment une seconde chance offerte par le destin ?

title.en: Record of Ragnarok: The Apocalypse of the Gods

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ禁伝 神々の黙示録

altTitles.ja-ro: Shuumatsu no Warukyuure Kinden Kamigami no Apokaripusu
Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kinden Kamigami no Apocalypse

description.en: Zeus, supreme chairman of the Council of Valhalla, announces to the gods twelve of the thirteen fighters set to participate in Ragnarok--and is met with the dissenting voices of those who were not chosen. However, Zeus has foreseen this, and immediately declares the holding of another tournament to decide the final spot on the Ragnarok lineup, one which will break the taboo on gods fighting one another. Thus begins the "Revelation" of the untold side of *Record of Ragnarok!*

After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

altTitles.th: อ่านชะตาวันสิ้นโลก

altTitles.ja: 全知的な読者の視点から

altTitles.vi: Góc nhìn của Độc giả Toàn tri

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？
